function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of intimate partner violence due to stay-at-home policies during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic","Impact":"Escalation of violence against women and potential harm to individuals in intimate relationships","Mitigation":"Provide accessible support services for victims, raise awareness, and implement measures to address economic challenges","Technologies":"Online support platforms, communication tools for awareness campaigns, and economic support systems","People":"Women in intimate relationships, individuals in domestic settings","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, support organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of sufficient space in developing countries exacerbating the impact of stay-at-home policies","Impact":"Increased proximity leading to higher risk of conflict and violence within households","Mitigation":"Explore alternative housing arrangements, provide community support, and address economic challenges","Technologies":"Innovative housing solutions, community outreach tools, economic development initiatives","People":"Families and individuals living in crowded households in developing countries","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations, housing initiatives"},{"Description":"Potential for spread of contagious diseases due to overcrowding in developing countries","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases within densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Improve sanitation, enhance healthcare access, and implement public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, telemedicine, mobile health applications","People":"Residents of overcrowded areas in developing countries","Owner":"Health organizations, government health departments, international aid organizations"}]}
